CustomField.description: make primary button for Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.formula: IF (AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c), NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approved'))),("/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id),IF(AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c), NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM', OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approved'))),(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id),NULL))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: make primary button for Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.label: Make Primary Button Field
